void Container::Pick_up ( Vector  from,
float  r,
Container *  to,
bool  all 
)

Function: Pick_up

Pick up an item (all items are Entities) and add it to your inventory.

Parameters: from: Position of the Entity (Player) picking up the item r: Radius around item to determine whether the Entity is close enough to: Pointer to Entity (Player) whose inventory receives the item all: Endless_supply defines
